abi: event NewEvent(uint256 indexed id, string name, uint256 endDate)
event NewGame(uint256 indexed id, string name, uint256 eventId)
event NewParticipant(uint256 indexed eventId, uint256 indexed gameId, address addr)
function getEvent(uint256 _id) view returns (tuple(uint256 id, string name, uint256 startDate, uint256 endDate, uint8 eventType, address owner, bool resolved, uint256[] outcome))

function getGame(uint256 _id) view returns (tuple(uint256 id, string name, uint256 stake, address tokenAddress, bool closed, uint256 eventId, uint8 payoutRule, bool checkApproval, tuple(address addr, uint256[] prediction)[] participants))
function registerGame(string _name, uint256 _stake, address _tokenAddress, uint256 _eventId, uint8 _payoutRule, bool _checkApproval)
